title: New skins, yay!
body:
Amount of skins Jinx got in last 2 seasons: 4
Amount of skins LITERALLY half the champ pool got in last 2 seasons: 0

Riot, you say you wanna avoid releasing like many same class champions in a row to keep diversity, why does that not apply on skins? Is the skin-selling difference that high?

replies.body:
1. she's only gotten 3 skins including the upcoming star guardian skin in the last 2 seasons. Slayer, firecracker, and now sg. 
2. Prior to SG, she only had 4 skins, which is less than a vast majority of champions. There are only 11 champions that had less than she did, 5 champions with 2 skins, and 6 champions with 3. 

how anyone is going to complain about jinx getting a new skin is beyond me.

Well I'd bet it was 4 lol :'D

And then this is not about total skin amount, it's about the amount of skins in the short period of time.

It's situational, a big point being who in these roles would fit this theme that's currently being worked on the best along with these other champions and their own personalities that could clash with these skins.

There's that or they could just pick a champion favorite and drop a skin on them because that's what most people want.
Yeah, Jinx really fits in Star GUARDIAN theme........

She actually fit's the theme well. There is no perfect team, everyone needs that one rebellious person in the group, and her thing about this skin is that she's not even in the group yet, it states that's she's too defiant to actually join them, but if she learned the ways she would be the most powerful one.
